Name: Endless Bullet Heaven
About the game: Enjoy this challenge in bullet avoidance! In this game, you move using just the mouse to avoid any and all projectiles that come your way. After a few seconds of surviving the bullet pattern, a target will appear. Either wait out the attack timer or click the target to gain more score and advance the bullet pattern to a new, randomly selected one. Survive as long as you can, get high scores, and experience a wide variety of bullet patterns! The points you gain from survival can be used to purchase cosmetics and customize your looks! Featuring: A unique and charming protagonist, with a growing roster of characters! 35+ Fully unique bullet patterns (which can then be given additional modifiers) Many achievements, with more being added in each update Plenty of items to unlock! Note: Game is currently in an early state and will be updated regularly! Made with Gamemaker 1.4.
